original: @250a * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @250a * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: kra ma sha ta n'a ma /
analyzed: kra ma sha ta n'a ma /
translated: Krama-shatanama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rim ba drug pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rim ba drug pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Six Stages

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrapani

original: 'gro rnams rtog pa'i ngor gyur rtog gnas te //
analyzed: 'gro rnams rtog pa'i ngor gyur rtog gnas te //
translated: Beings are in the realm of conceptual thought,

original: de la rtog cing dge dang mi dger 'dzin //
analyzed: de la rtog cing dge dang mi dger 'dzin //
translated: And in that they think and grasp at virtue and nonvirtue.

original: dug dgra'i gseb thar chu srin kha ru ni //
analyzed: dug dgra'i gseb thar chu srin kha ru ni //
translated: Like a boat in the jaws of a sea monster,

original: gru chad bzhin du dga' dang mi dga' ste //
analyzed: gru chad bzhin du dga' dang mi dga' ste //
translated: They are happy and unhappy,

original: rtag tu brtse bas 'dzin cing nga ros 'jigs //
analyzed: rtag tu brtse bas 'dzin cing nga ros 'jigs //
translated: Constantly held with affection and frightened by my roar.

original: de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud cing 'dud //
analyzed: de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud cing 'dud //
translated: To that, all things bow and bow.

original: bka' drin thob dang rang nyams rtog de dran /
analyzed: bka' drin thob dang rang nyams rtog de dran /
translated: Remembering the kindness received and the realization of one's own experience,üîΩHere, the desired gods are pleased and there is renunciation,

original: de 'dir 'dod lha mnyes dang nges 'byung dang // sbyor ba gzhan gyis nges par 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: de 'dir 'dod lha mnyes dang nges 'byung dang // sbyor ba gzhan gyis nges par 'byung ba yin //
translated: And by other means there is definite deliverance.

original: dang po gnyis yin gnyis pa bzhi ru snang /
analyzed: dang po gnyis yin gnyis pa bzhi ru snang /
translated: The first two are the two, the second appears as four,

original: dang po bzlas pa 'grub dang grub pa'i rtags //
analyzed: dang po bzlas pa 'grub dang grub pa'i rtags //
translated: The first is the accomplishment of recitation and the signs of accomplishment.

original: gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni //
translated: The signs and indications of the accomplishment of secret mantra

original: glegs bam du ma 'tsher mthong lag gis len //
analyzed: glegs bam du ma 'tsher mthong lag gis len //
translated: And many volumes of scriptures, which he sees with his own hands.üîΩHe sees many forms of the sounds of offerings, such as great drums,

original: rnga chen dung dang cha lang dril bu dang // mchod pa'i sgra sgrogs du ma'i gzugs mthong ba //
analyzed: rnga chen dung dang cha lang dril bu dang // mchod pa'i sgra sgrogs du ma'i gzugs mthong ba //
translated: conches, flutes, and bells,üîΩmandalas, and the forms of those who make offerings,

original: mandal dkyil 'khor las byed chos 'chad nyan //
analyzed: mandal dkyil 'khor las byed chos 'chad nyan //
translated: those who listen to the Dharma,

original: glegs bam klog cing dkyus ltar 'dri ba smra //üîΩras ris la ni bde gshegs gzugs brnyan ni //
analyzed: glegs bam klog cing dkyus ltar 'dri ba smra // ras ris la ni bde gshegs gzugs brnyan ni //
translated: those who read scriptures, and those who copy them.üîΩIn the painting, he sees many forms of the Sugata,

original: du ma mthong zhing rten gyi gzugs mthong ba //
analyzed: du ma mthong zhing rten gyi gzugs mthong ba //
translated: and the forms of those who are supports.

original: rol mo'i gzugs byed mchod rten gdugs sogs byed //
analyzed: rol mo'i gzugs byed mchod rten gdugs sogs byed //
translated: He makes musical instruments, st≈´pas, parasols, and so forth.

original: rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnyed dam mthong //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnyed dam mthong //
translated: He finds or sees symbols such as vajras.üîΩHe sees various flowers clearly,üîΩthe light of the sun and moon shining, the planets and stars,

original: me tog sna tshogs gsal bar mthong ba dang // nyi zla'i 'od 'bab gza' ska ra go mthong dang // me gtong du langs nam mkha' yang ni 'khrigs //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs gsal bar mthong ba dang // nyi zla'i 'od 'bab gza' ska ra go mthong dang // me gtong du langs nam mkha' yang ni 'khrigs //
translated: and a fire burning in the sky.

original: rdzing la chu 'dre na khron ba las ni le na //
analyzed: rdzing la chu 'dre na khron ba las ni le na //
translated: If the water in a pond swirls,

original: 'bras kyi myu gu bzang dang lo ma bzang //
analyzed: 'bras kyi myu gu bzang dang lo ma bzang //
translated: he will obtain rice shoots, good rice, and good leaves.

original: ce sbyang la sogs thul ba gos bzang gyon //
analyzed: ce sbyang la sogs thul ba gos bzang gyon //
translated: He wears good clothes, such as those made of cat's fur.

original: rgyan cha bzang zhing mtshon cha rno ba 'dzin //
analyzed: rgyan cha bzang zhing mtshon cha rno ba 'dzin //
translated: Wearing fine ornaments and holding sharp weapons,

original: de rnams byung gyur gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags //
analyzed: de rnams byung gyur gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags //
translated: These are signs of the accomplishment of mantra.

original: rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste rim pa dang po'o /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste rim pa dang po'o /
translated: This is the first stage of the signs of the accomplishment of mantra by the yogi.

original: // / mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos srid gsum mthong //
analyzed: // / mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos srid gsum mthong //
translated: The three worlds are seen by the sense organs such as the eyes,

original: thos dang snga phyi'i skye dran rdzas kun lud //
analyzed: thos dang snga phyi'i skye dran rdzas kun lud //
translated: And all substances are remembered from past and future lives.

original: ras ris bzhad cing ro sogs 'od 'byung dri //
analyzed: ras ris bzhad cing ro sogs 'od 'byung dri //
translated: The painting smiles and light emerges from the corpse and so forth,

original: mun nag me tog char 'bab 'ja' tshon snang ;
analyzed: mun nag me tog char 'bab 'ja' tshon snang ;
translated: Smells, rain of flowers in the dark, and rainbow appearances.

original: / tshogs na chos 'chad mun nag glegs bam dpyod //
analyzed: / tshogs na chos 'chad mun nag glegs bam dpyod //
translated: In the assembly, teaching the Dharma, analyzing the scriptures in the dark,

original: nam mkha' stong las sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra //
analyzed: nam mkha' stong las sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra //
translated: The sound of various musical instruments from the empty sky,üîΩThunder, lightning, and the falling of great thunderbolts,üîΩSeeing the empty sky and blue clouds,üîΩAnd likewise, the definite transformation of dark blue clouds,

original: 'brug sgra glog 'gyur thog chen 'bebs pa dang // nam mkha' stong zhing sprin sngon mthong ba dang // de bzhin mthing nag sprin sngon nges 'gyur dang // snyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od ldan sa gzhi bdal /
analyzed: 'brug sgra glog 'gyur thog chen 'bebs pa dang // nam mkha' stong zhing sprin sngon mthong ba dang // de bzhin mthing nag sprin sngon nges 'gyur dang // snyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od ldan sa gzhi bdal /
translated: The shining moon mandala spreading across the ground,

original: @250b ras ris lugs ma la sogs bde gshegs gzugs //üîΩmchod cing skor ba byed dang rten la skor //
analyzed: @250b ras ris lugs ma la sogs bde gshegs gzugs // mchod cing skor ba byed dang rten la skor //
translated: The image of the Sugata, whether painted or sculpted,üîΩis worshipped, circumambulated, and venerated.

original: dkyil 'khor bris nas mchod dam dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bris nas mchod dam dbang bskur ba //
translated: Having drawn a mandala, one makes offerings or confers empowerment.

original: mdzes pa'i snong du me tog sna tshogs thu //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i snong du me tog sna tshogs thu //
translated: In a beautiful place, one gathers various flowers.

original: rin chen sna tshogs me tog bee p'ur rnyed //
analyzed: rin chen sna tshogs me tog bee p'ur rnyed //
translated: One finds various jewels, flowers, and bezoar.

original: shin tu skam pa'i las chu rdol ba //
analyzed: shin tu skam pa'i las chu rdol ba //
translated: In a place that is very dry, water springs forth.

original: bdag nyid me dpung nang 'dug srog chags tshig //
analyzed: bdag nyid me dpung nang 'dug srog chags tshig //
translated: One's own body, in the midst of a bonfire, is consumed by flames.

original: ting 'dzin gsal zhing yi dags gzugs la brtson //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsal zhing yi dags gzugs la brtson //
translated: One is clear in samƒÅdhi, striving in the form of a hungry ghost.

original: dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas ni du ma mthong //
analyzed: dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas ni du ma mthong //
translated: One sees many solitary and delightful places.

original: rtse gcig pa yi bsam gtan byed //
analyzed: rtse gcig pa yi bsam gtan byed //
translated: One practices one-pointed concentration.

original: seng ge'i khri steng gnas pa rmi //
analyzed: seng ge'i khri steng gnas pa rmi //
translated: One dreams of being on a lion throne.üîΩOne dreams of being in a temple, a place, or a house,

original: lha khang gnas gzhi rtsig mchungs dang // chu bo che dang / rgya mtsho'i steng nas 'gro //
analyzed: lha khang gnas gzhi rtsig mchungs dang // chu bo che dang / rgya mtsho'i steng nas 'gro //
translated: or of going on a great river or the ocean.

original: bar snang 'phur zhing bsdigs pa'i ltos 'gro len //
analyzed: bar snang 'phur zhing bsdigs pa'i ltos 'gro len //
translated: One flies in the sky and goes to distant places.

original: 'di 'dra'i rmi lam gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i rmi lam gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags //
translated: Such dreams are signs of accomplishing secret mantra.

original: rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o //
translated: These are the two stages of the signs of the accomplishment of the secret mantra by the yogin.

original: / gnyis pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: / gnyis pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the first of the fourth [are as follows]:

original: sbyor ba gzhan byung rnal 'byor nyid la 'ong //
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan byung rnal 'byor nyid la 'ong //
translated: The yoga arises from the occurrence of another yoga.

original: ri gzar dag la mi thar mthar zad lhung //
analyzed: ri gzar dag la mi thar mthar zad lhung //
translated: One falls to the end, without escape, on a steep mountain.

original: ri brags 'dzul 'dod chu dong lhung ba dang // phyugs lhas 'dam rdzab bshang gci'i nang dang ni //
analyzed: ri brags 'dzul 'dod chu dong lhung ba dang // phyugs lhas 'dam rdzab bshang gci'i nang dang ni //
translated: One wishes to enter a mountain fortress, but falls into a pit of water, or into a swamp of cow dung and urine,

original: kha dog dmar dang skya ba'i chu dag la //
analyzed: kha dog dmar dang skya ba'i chu dag la //
translated: or into water that is red or pale in color.

original: rtsub dang gnag pa'i gos dang dmar ba'i gos //
analyzed: rtsub dang gnag pa'i gos dang dmar ba'i gos //
translated: One wears rough or black clothes, or red clothes.

original: shin tu hrul po'i tshe ta'i bags pa'i gyon //
analyzed: shin tu hrul po'i tshe ta'i bags pa'i gyon //
translated: One wears a garment of very tattered leather.üîΩOne sits on a tree stump, fearing a fall from the mountain, without support.

original: shing rtsi ri las lhung dogs rten med 'dug / gcer bur 'dug cing lcag lcig chu nang l'gro //
analyzed: shing rtsi ri las lhung dogs rten med 'dug / gcer bur 'dug cing lcag lcig chu nang l'gro //
translated: One sits naked, and goes into a swamp of nettles.

original: gzung 'dzin yod pa'i rten sa de ru ni //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin yod pa'i rten sa de ru ni //
translated: In that place, which is the support of the existence of the apprehended and apprehender,

original: nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu 'gro ba rmi //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu 'gro ba rmi //
translated: one always goes, day and night, in one's dreams.

original: glang nag glang dmar ba nag ba dmar zhon //
analyzed: glang nag glang dmar ba nag ba dmar zhon //
translated: One rides a black bull, a red bull, a black horse, or a red horse.

original: rtsub pa'i gos gyon ga ta la zhon pa //
analyzed: rtsub pa'i gos gyon ga ta la zhon pa //
translated: One wears rough clothes, and rides a gayal.

original: ma he ba lang khyus 'gro sogs rmi ba //
analyzed: ma he ba lang khyus 'gro sogs rmi ba //
translated: and buffaloes, cows, and herds moving.üîΩSeeing black cows, herds moving,üîΩhorses, goats, and round-eyed herds moving,

original: gnag dang ba lang khyus 'gro sogs mthong dang // rta dang ga ta mig zlum khyus 'gro sogs //üîΩbe ta tshe ta khyus 'gro sogs mthong ba //üîΩseng gi spyang dang khyi sogs mche can rmi //
analyzed: gnag dang ba lang khyus 'gro sogs mthong dang // rta dang ga ta mig zlum khyus 'gro sogs // be ta tshe ta khyus 'gro sogs mthong ba // seng gi spyang dang khyi sogs mche can rmi //
translated: and seeing herds of goats, sheep, and herds moving,üîΩone dreams of lions, wolves, and dogs with fangs,

original: bse dang byi ba snger chags rmi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bse dang byi ba snger chags rmi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: and of rhinoceroses, mice, and moles.

original: sbyor ba gzhan gyis gnod pa 'gyur ba rnal 'byor pa la mchan ma 'ong ba'i rim pa ste gsum pa'o /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan gyis gnod pa 'gyur ba rnal 'byor pa la mchan ma 'ong ba'i rim pa ste gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the third section on the stages of the signs not coming to the yogƒ´ due to being harmed by other activities.

original: // / gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: // / gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the two in the fourth section of the second [chapter]

original: rnal 'byor stobs kyis mi thub mtshan nyid ni //üîΩbya dang ba sbrul gdug gnas pa'i mtsho //
analyzed: rnal 'byor stobs kyis mi thub mtshan nyid ni // bya dang ba sbrul gdug gnas pa'i mtsho //
translated: are the characteristics of being unable by the power of yoga.üîΩA lake inhabited by birds and poisonous snakes,üîΩinhabited by crocodiles, fish, and water,üîΩand by scorpions, lizards, and multi-legged creatures,

original: chu srin nya dang chu sogs gnas pa dang // sdig pa sdom dang rtsangs pa rkang mangs dang // sbrang bu mchu rings @251a * //
analyzed: chu srin nya dang chu sogs gnas pa dang // sdig pa sdom dang rtsangs pa rkang mangs dang // sbrang bu mchu rings @251a * //
translated: and by mosquitoes,

original: srog chags phra mo rnams //
analyzed: srog chags phra mo rnams //
translated: and by small creatures,

original: de rnams rmi gyur bran rnams sbyor ba gnod //
analyzed: de rnams rmi gyur bran rnams sbyor ba gnod //
translated: these are dreams of the harm of activities of servants.

original: sbrul dang sbal pa sngon ma dang sdig pa dang // bya sogs lus 'byar mchus 'debs gshog sbrug dang // be ta la sogs rdzi med mdog rgod rmi //
analyzed: sbrul dang sbal pa sngon ma dang sdig pa dang // bya sogs lus 'byar mchus 'debs gshog sbrug dang // be ta la sogs rdzi med mdog rgod rmi //
translated: and of the vetƒÅla and so on, with their hair disheveled and their faces contorted,üîΩthis is a sign of non-accomplishment. If one dreams of a mad woman,

original: mi thub rtags te bud med smyo ba dang / mi thub kun la brdeg 'gyur mdog rgod ma //
analyzed: mi thub rtags te bud med smyo ba dang / mi thub kun la brdeg 'gyur mdog rgod ma //
translated: of being beaten by all the non-accomplished ones, and of a contorted face,

original: rgyan bzangs mdzes pa'i snod du zas sogs bkang //
analyzed: rgyan bzangs mdzes pa'i snod du zas sogs bkang //
translated: of filling a beautiful and well-adorned vessel with food and so on,

original: rtag tu rgan mor 'ong 'gyur mi thub rtags //
analyzed: rtag tu rgan mor 'ong 'gyur mi thub rtags //
translated: and of always coming to an old woman, this is a sign of non-accomplishment.üîΩIf one dreams of a body with a snake wrapped around it, of not being able to free oneself,

original: ltos 'gros lus dkris ldan zhing mi phrel dang // sdig dang rtsangs sogs 'byang zhing mchus btsugs pa //
analyzed: ltos 'gros lus dkris ldan zhing mi phrel dang // sdig dang rtsangs sogs 'byang zhing mchus btsugs pa //
translated: of scorpions, lizards, and so on, of being pierced by a beak,

original: sbrang bu mchu rings srog chags phra mo rnams //
analyzed: sbrang bu mchu rings srog chags phra mo rnams //
translated: of mosquitoes, gadflies, and other small creatures,

original: khrag 'jib lus nang zhugs gyur mi thub rtags //üîΩchu srin nya sogs chu chen 'phyo zhing 'khyu //
analyzed: khrag 'jib lus nang zhugs gyur mi thub rtags // chu srin nya sogs chu chen 'phyo zhing 'khyu //
translated: of sucking blood and entering the body, this is a sign of non-accomplishment.üîΩIf one dreams of crocodiles, fish, and so on, floating and swimming in great waters,

original: gnag dang dmar srog chu yis khyer ba rmi //
analyzed: gnag dang dmar srog chu yis khyer ba rmi //
translated: of being carried away by black and red waters,

original: de yang mi thub rtags te brtson par bzlog / dad ldan brtson pas mi 'grub gang yang med //
analyzed: de yang mi thub rtags te brtson par bzlog / dad ldan brtson pas mi 'grub gang yang med //
translated: this too is a sign of non-accomplishment. One should stop striving. For the faithful and diligent, there is nothing that cannot be accomplished.

original: sbyor ba gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa rnal 'byor pa'i stobs kyis mi thub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa rnal 'byor pa'i stobs kyis mi thub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: The fourth is the sequence of signs of the yogi's inability to overcome the harm that arises from other preparations by force.

original: // / gnyis pa bzhi pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: // / gnyis pa bzhi pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the second, fourth, and third are

original: rnal 'byor rtsal gyis thub cing non pa'i rtags //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rtsal gyis thub cing non pa'i rtags //
translated: the signs of the yogi's ability to overcome and control by force.

original: ma he gnag sogs rdzud cing rid pa dang // dud 'gro rnams ni btags sam brtod gyur pa //
analyzed: ma he gnag sogs rdzud cing rid pa dang // dud 'gro rnams ni btags sam brtod gyur pa //
translated: The signs of being bound or tied by animals,

original: dud 'gro dgras khyer brtod dam rkun mos khyer //
analyzed: dud 'gro dgras khyer brtod dam rkun mos khyer //
translated: being carried off by animal enemies, being carried off by thieves,üîΩanimals living, chaff of rice scattered,

original: dud 'gro 'tsho dang 'bras kyi phub ma 'chag / dud 'gro 'khor dang rdzi yis sbyong ba dang // dud 'gro yor dang 'gab thegs thub ba'i rtags //
analyzed: dud 'gro 'tsho dang 'bras kyi phub ma 'chag / dud 'gro 'khor dang rdzi yis sbyong ba dang // dud 'gro yor dang 'gab thegs thub ba'i rtags //
translated: animals circling, being cleaned by a herder,üîΩanimals able to cross over a pit or a ditch,üîΩthe signs of killing animals, boiling and eating them,üîΩoneself and others being burned by fire,

original: dud 'gro gsad dang btsos nas za ba dang // rang gzhan me byung dud 'gro tshig gyur dang // de ni nges par dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags //
analyzed: dud 'gro gsad dang btsos nas za ba dang // rang gzhan me byung dud 'gro tshig gyur dang // de ni nges par dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags //
translated: are signs of definitely being under control.

original: bud med rgud cing do dma' shi ba dang // du zhing rgyan bzang gus pas phyag phyed dang // gnas nas gzhan 'gro thub pa'i rtags su bstan //
analyzed: bud med rgud cing do dma' shi ba dang // du zhing rgyan bzang gus pas phyag phyed dang // gnas nas gzhan 'gro thub pa'i rtags su bstan //
translated: are taught as the signs of success.

original: sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma rnams //
analyzed: sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma rnams //
translated: Many creatures such as snakesüîΩare killed, eaten, die, or are driven away,

original: bsad dam zos sam shi'am ded gyur dang // skem dang tshig gyur thub pa'i rtags yin no //
analyzed: bsad dam zos sam shi'am ded gyur dang // skem dang tshig gyur thub pa'i rtags yin no //
translated: and become emaciated or burned‚Äîthese are the signs of success.

original: bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas mtsho skams //
analyzed: bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas mtsho skams //
translated: Birds, mice, and poisonous snakes live in dry lakes,

original: bud med zhum zhing du ba thub pa'i rtags //
analyzed: bud med zhum zhing du ba thub pa'i rtags //
translated: and women become depressed and cry‚Äîthese are signs of success.

original: sbyor ba gzhan rnal 'byor pa'i rtsal gyis non pa'i ltas kyi rim pa ste lnga pa'o /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan rnal 'byor pa'i rtsal gyis non pa'i ltas kyi rim pa ste lnga pa'o /
translated: This is the fifth chapter on the signs of the ability of the yogin to overpower other practitioners through yoga.

original: // / gnyis pa bzhi pa bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: // / gnyis pa bzhi pa bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the second, fourth, and fourthüîΩare as follows:

original: sbyor gzhan rab tu khros par gyur pa ni //
analyzed: sbyor gzhan rab tu khros par gyur pa ni //
translated: When another practitioner becomes very angry,

original: rang nyid mi g-yog nas na gnas nas ni //
analyzed: rang nyid mi g-yog nas na gnas nas ni //
translated: he himself becomes restless and leaves his place,

original: sbrul pa sna tshogs gzugs ni ston cing phyogs //
analyzed: sbrul pa sna tshogs gzugs ni ston cing phyogs //
translated: and displays various forms in all directions.

original: 'khor dang @251b bka' yi pho nya 'gyed cing 'dug / rigs mtho'i 'dra 'bag bu chung rab byung gzugs //
analyzed: 'khor dang @251b bka' yi pho nya 'gyed cing 'dug / rigs mtho'i 'dra 'bag bu chung rab byung gzugs //
translated: The image of a man of high caste is a young monk.

original: 'od gyur thang las skyes pa'i pho nya yin //
analyzed: 'od gyur thang las skyes pa'i pho nya yin //
translated: The messenger born from the field of light is a boy.

original: de ni bzlog par bya ba'i thabs ni gzugs //üîΩblon po yul gyi rgan rabs 'od 'gyur dang // brod pa skyes pa gzhon nu bon po'i gzugs //
analyzed: de ni bzlog par bya ba'i thabs ni gzugs // blon po yul gyi rgan rabs 'od 'gyur dang // brod pa skyes pa gzhon nu bon po'i gzugs //
translated: The means of warding him off is the form.üîΩThe minister, the elder of the land, is the messenger born from the field of light.

original: sngags pa'i gzugs ni 'ong 'gyur brag skyes yin //
analyzed: sngags pa'i gzugs ni 'ong 'gyur brag skyes yin //
translated: The one who is born from the rock is the messenger who comes in the form of a young man of the Bon religion.

original: de bcos bya ba'i thabs ni bstan pa yin //
analyzed: de bcos bya ba'i thabs ni bstan pa yin //
translated: The means of curing him is the teaching.

original: dkar dmar gnag cing shin tu mang ba yi //
analyzed: dkar dmar gnag cing shin tu mang ba yi //
translated: The one who is very dark, red, and white,üîΩwho lives among cattle and is born in the land of cattle,

original: ba lang 'tsho zhing phyugs nang 'dug pa dang // ral pa bzang po bud med smug nag dang // g-ya' rig ngas ri las skyes pho nya yin //
analyzed: ba lang 'tsho zhing phyugs nang 'dug pa dang // ral pa bzang po bud med smug nag dang // g-ya' rig ngas ri las skyes pho nya yin //
translated: the one who is born from the mountain of slate, is the messenger.

original: de phyir thabs ni du ma yod par gsungs //üîΩbud med gzhon zhing rgyan bzangs rab byung ma //
analyzed: de phyir thabs ni du ma yod par gsungs // bud med gzhon zhing rgyan bzangs rab byung ma //
translated: Therefore, many means are taught.üîΩThe young woman with good ornaments is a nun.üîΩThe image of a mother, aunt, sister, or niece

original: ma dang sru mo sring mo ni ne mo yi gzugs //
analyzed: ma dang sru mo sring mo ni ne mo yi gzugs //
translated: is the messenger.

original: nye du nye 'brel khrom chen bud med dang // bu mo chung ma mtsho las skyes pa yin //
analyzed: nye du nye 'brel khrom chen bud med dang // bu mo chung ma mtsho las skyes pa yin //
translated: girls, wives, and those born from the ocean.üîΩThe method of subduing them is to be done,

original: de ni mnan pa'i thabs ni bya ba dang // de rnams zhi 'gyur 'ga' zhig dbang du 'du //
analyzed: de ni mnan pa'i thabs ni bya ba dang // de rnams zhi 'gyur 'ga' zhig dbang du 'du //
translated: and they will be pacified, some brought under control.

original: dbang du 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad las thar //
analyzed: dbang du 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad las thar //
translated: One is freed from the disease of conceptual going and coming.

original: khyi la sogs pa dud 'gro phal cher ni //
analyzed: khyi la sogs pa dud 'gro phal cher ni //
translated: Dogs and so forth, most of the animals,

original: sbyor ba gzhan gyi pho nya yin pas bzlog //
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan gyi pho nya yin pas bzlog //
translated: are messengers of other practices, so they are rejected.

original: rang gi ngo bo gtso bo'i gzugs can te //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo gtso bo'i gzugs can te //
translated: Their own nature is the form of the principal one,

original: dud 'gro'i gzugs ldan rgyan ldan de nyid do //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i gzugs ldan rgyan ldan de nyid do //
translated: endowed with ornaments, possessing the form of an animal.

original: nam mkha'i mthongs na gnas shing sprul pa yi //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthongs na gnas shing sprul pa yi //
translated: The emanations abiding in the vault of the sky

original: gzugs ni ma lus brjod kyis mi lang ste //
analyzed: gzugs ni ma lus brjod kyis mi lang ste //
translated: are inexpressible in their entirety.

original: de yang dpag tu med pa'i mtha' mi rtogs //
analyzed: de yang dpag tu med pa'i mtha' mi rtogs //
translated: Moreover, their immeasurable limit is not realized.

original: de phyir bde gshegs mthu dang mtshungs pa yin //
analyzed: de phyir bde gshegs mthu dang mtshungs pa yin //
translated: Therefore, they are equal to the power of the Sugatas.

original: sbyor ba gzhan gyis bka'i pho nya bkye ba'i rim pa ste drug pa'o /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan gyis bka'i pho nya bkye ba'i rim pa ste drug pa'o /
translated: This is the sixth chapter on the sequence of sending forth the messenger of the command by other practices.

original: // / bla ma'i bka' dang lhag lhas gnang ba byin //
analyzed: // / bla ma'i bka' dang lhag lhas gnang ba byin //
translated: The guru's command and the permission of the excellent deity are given.

original: 'gro la brtse bas rtog pa cung zhig sbyar //
analyzed: 'gro la brtse bas rtog pa cung zhig sbyar //
translated: And with compassion for beings, I have applied myself a little to reflection.

original: de yi ge bci bsags pa //
analyzed: de yi ge bci bsags pa //
translated: Whatever merit I have gained

original: rtog la nges shing nges rtogs shog //
analyzed: rtog la nges shing nges rtogs shog //
translated: By this, may all beings come to understand the truth.

original: rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa /
analyzed: rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa /
translated: The sixth chapter called the Clarification of the Signs,üîΩis completed.

original: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dz'a wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dz'a wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It was composed by the master JƒÅbirƒ´, who came from the Namdru family and attained spiritual accomplishment.

original: // / pandi ta pun+ya ma ti dang lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta pun+ya ma ti dang lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the pa·πá·∏çita Pu·πáyamati and the translator Ch√∂kyi Zangpo.
